main event: Several civilians reported observing three unidentified flying objects with one white and one red light over Marrero, Louisiana on February 14, 1957.
interesting points: The objects were observed in a V formation before scattering,The sighting lasted for 1 hour and 40 minutes,The objects' maneuvers were likened to those of aircraft,The radar detected nebulous targets in the area,The lights were reported as one white light and one red flashing light.
sighted object: three unidentified flying objects characterized by one white light and one red light
witness description: civilians including several who reported the sightings
